en.rtabyeapf: Remember to always Backup your efs and persist folders!
en.internetcheck: Network lost... Please check your internet connection!
en.internetcheckfiles: Network lost... can't connect to server to download files!
en.dnotcompatiblebody: is not compatible. This MotoTool works with:
en.readfirmware: Please connect your device to read firmwares!
en.devicerememberlistbox: Remember to always have enable USB DEBUGGING!
en.noupdatebody: There is no update available please try again later.
en.updateerrorbody: There is a problem reaching update server please check your internet connection and try again later.
en.bootloaderreadme: To Unlock Moto Bootloader: Sign in on the following page. Follow the guide on the page. The Tool will open a CMD Console where drivers are allocated. Here you must enter the commands lines!
en.lockbootloaderbody1: 1°: Do you want to Lock the bootloader? This will erase all your data!
en.lockbootloaderbody2: 2°: Are you sure that you want to Lock the bootloader? This will erase all your data!
en.lockbootloaderbody3: Try to not UNPLUG THE DEVICE during the process!
en.connectdevicemototool: Please connect your device, so MotoTool can check your device!
en.connecttotwrp: Please plug your device on booted TWRP!
en.motoflashplug: Please plug your device! Remember to plug your phone on Fastboot Mode!
en.flashtwrppermanent: Hey! This option is not for A/B devices!, but you can download TWRP installer and flash it! first you need to boot TWRP!
en.flashtwrpab: Hey! This option is not for A/B devices!, check the Boot option!
en.twrpnotsupport: Hey this device doesn't have twrp yet! :(
en.blankflashnotsupport: Hey this device doesn't have blankflash yet! :(. If you know about an existing blankflash you can contact me and i'll add it
en.blankflashcheck: Please, check if your device has booted up into Bootloader mode!
en.motodrivers: Error on loading Motorola drivers... Now Tool will download drivers and install it!
en.motodriversinstall: Please install the following drivers! Tool will be closed!
en.clearfoldersbody: All Folders cleared! The app will restart!
en.MSGBOXServerNetworkLost: Can't connect to server! Please check your internet connection!
en.MSGBOXBootloaderWarning: Device doesn't found, Please plug the phone and check if developer (adb) options are enabled!
en.MsgBoxResultFirmwareInfo: Firmware it's already downloaded! Now the firmware will be extracted it!
en.firmwareerror: Can't find firmware images on folder! firmware will be downloaded again!
en.motoflashdevicenotcompatible: Hey! im working to make compatible your device! device compatible for now: Beckham, Doha, Potter and Sanders
en.motoflashdownload: Please download your firmware! - Device Channel:
en.motoflashdowngrade: Hey! this is not ready yet! soon will be working...
en.clearfolderswarn: This will remove all files from C:\\adb\\ folder!
en.clearfolderswarns2: Do you want to clear all the folders? You will remove all files except for the important ones. Folder Size:
en.debloatothershelp: Please, write the app package like this: -com.google.android.apps.translate-
en.helpcoy: © 2019 - 2020 Franco28: A simple IT student - Argentina
en.uninstallwarn: This will remove all the Tool!
en.uninscont: Do you want to Uninstall the Tool?
en.unzipexctractok: The zip has been extracted well!
